data.comment: Bahia kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Important block from the Atletico Mineiro defence as Clayson fires in a strike for Bahia.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Bahia in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Bahia.
In the minute 2, Anderson Daronco awards the away team a throw-in.
Anderson Daronco awards Bahia a goal kick.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 4, Throw-in Bahia.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 7, Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bahia's half?
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Salvador.
In the minute 11, Atletico Mineiro are pushing forward but Eduardo Sasha's finish is wide of the goal.
Bahia have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Atletico Mineiro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 13, Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Keno gets his shot on target but fails to score for Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro's Keno misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 14, Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
Keno of Atletico Mineiro gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 17, Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Goal kick for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
Anderson Daronco signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Bahia's half.
In the minute 20, Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Atletico Mineiro take a 0-1 lead thanks to Jefferson Savarino.
Rever instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Bahia to take a throw-in in Atletico Mineiro territory.
Throw-in for Bahia in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 23, Anderson Daronco signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Bahia's half.
Atletico Mineiro are coming forward and Junior Alonso gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Anderson Daronco awards Bahia a goal kick.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Ball safe as Atletico Mineiro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
In the minute 27, Junior Alonso's header is off-target for Atletico Mineiro.
Bahia have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 29, Atletico Mineiro's Nathan gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Bahia defender.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Anderson Daronco awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 34, Free kick Atletico Mineiro.
Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bahia's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 36, Bahia will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Atletico Mineiro.
In Salvador, Jair (Atletico Mineiro) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Salvador.
In the minute 37, Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Bahia's Edson has been booked in Salvador.
In the minute 40, Atletico Mineiro are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro's Guilherme Arana gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 42, Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
Throw-in for Bahia in their own half.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 44, Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, In Salvador Bahia attack through Elias. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Salvador.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half is underway. Atletico Mineiro with the kick-off.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Bahia.
The home team have replaced Edson with Gilberto. This is the first substitution made today by Mano Menezes.
In the minute 46, Bahia make their second substitution with Marco Antonio replacing Clayson.
Igor Rabello is replacing Rever for Atletico Mineiro at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 47, Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
In Salvador Atletico Mineiro drive forward through Keno. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Atletico Mineiro are pushing forward but Keno's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 49, Throw-in Bahia.
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 51, Anderson Daronco signals a throw-in for Atletico Mineiro, close to Bahia's area.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro.
Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Bahia.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 55, Gilberto is booked for the home team.
Ball safe as Atletico Mineiro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bahia are whistled for offside.
In the minute 57, Mano Menezes (Bahia) is making a third substitution, with Daniel replacing Ramon.
Throw-in for Bahia in their own half.
Anderson Daronco signals a Bahia throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Bahia in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Keno for Atletico Mineiro gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 60, Goal kick for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
Anderson Daronco awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bahia's half?
In the minute 64, Atletico Mineiro's Jefferson Savarino breaks free at Arena Fonte Nova. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Anderson Daronco awards Bahia a goal kick.
Keno of Atletico Mineiro gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 65, Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
Gregore for Bahia gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Atletico Mineiro have a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Free kick Bahia.
Throw-in for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 67, At Arena Fonte Nova, Junior Alonso has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Daniel gets an equalizer for Bahia. The score is now 1-1.
Gregore with an assist there.
In the minute 71, Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro just outside Bahia's area.
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
Bahia's Marco Antonio gets in a shot on goal at Arena Fonte Nova. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Bahia.
Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
In Salvador, Marco Antonio of Bahia is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 76, Atletico Mineiro drive upfield and Jefferson Savarino gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Bahia defender.
Bahia needs to be cautious. Atletico Mineiro have an attacking throw-in.
Mano Menezes is making the team's fourth substitution at Arena Fonte Nova with Alesson replacing Fessin.
In the minute 77, Bahia push forward at Arena Fonte Nova and Daniel gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Atletico Mineiro defence.
In Salvador Bahia attack through Daniel. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Salvador.
In the minute 79, The home team replace Ernando with Nino Paraiba.
The away team have replaced Eduardo Sasha with Marrony. This is the second substitution made today by Jorge Sampaoli.
Goal! Bahia have got their heads in front thanks to a Gilberto strike.
In the minute 81, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Bahia.
Jorge Sampaoli (Atletico Mineiro) is making a third substitution, with Savio replacing Nathan.
In the minute 83, Can Bahia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atletico Mineiro's half?
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 85, Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Bahia.
Elias (Bahia) has received a yellow card from Anderson Daronco.
Junior Alonso for Atletico Mineiro drives towards goal at Arena Fonte Nova. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 87, Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Bahia.
Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bahia's half?
In the minute 88, Free kick Atletico Mineiro.
Goal! Gilberto extends Bahia's lead to 3-1.
That's a fine assist from Daniel.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
Juninho Capixaba (Bahia) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Atletico Mineiro at Arena Fonte Nova.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro close to the penalty box.
Jefferson Savarino (Atletico Mineiro) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Marrony (Atletico Mineiro) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 3-1.
Alesson (Bahia) gets a yellow card.
